description: A snTrapBUMratelimitAlertLowThreshold trap signifies that the
ingress packets interms of bits have reached the configured

event.Summary: Ingress packets have reached the low-level threshold of $v2 bits

description: A count used to represent the Committed Information Rate in bits.
variables.name: FOUNDRY-CAR-MIB::agRateLimitBUMCounterCIR

description: A count used to represent the configured lower threshold level in bits, to generate the Alert.
variables.name: FOUNDRY-CAR-MIB::agRateLimitBUMCounterAlertLowLevelThreshold

description: A snTrapBUMratelimitAlertHighThreshold trap signifies that the
ingress packets interms of bits, have reached the configured

event.Summary: Ingress packets have reached the high-level threshold of $v2 bits

description: A count used to represent the Committed Information Rate in bits.
variables.name: FOUNDRY-CAR-MIB::agRateLimitBUMCounterCIR

description: A count used to represent the configured Higher threshold level in bits, to generate the Alert.
variables.name: FOUNDRY-CAR-MIB::agRateLimitBUMCounterAlertHighLevelThreshold

description: A snTrapBUMratelimitShutdownLinkDown trap signifies that the
port is shutdown after reaching the configured CIR in bps.

event.Summary: Port is shutdown after reaching the CIR of $v1 bps

description: A count used to represent the Committed Information Rate in bits.
variables.name: FOUNDRY-CAR-MIB::agRateLimitBUMCounterCIR

description: A snTrapBUMratelimitAlertHighThreshold trap signifies that the
port is UP after the specified shutdown timeout in minutes.

event.Summary: Port is up after being shutdown for the specified timeout period

description: A count used to represent the Committed Information Rate in bits.
variables.name: FOUNDRY-CAR-MIB::agRateLimitBUMCounterCIR
